simulator.gui
Interface GUI

public interface GUI

Graphical User Interface used to control the simulation and inspect the simulated objects.

Author:
Erick Lavoie

Method Summary
 void inspect(SimObject object)
          Show a graphical representation of the internal state of the objects and the events it has received so far
 void pause()
          Interrupt the simulation
 void resume()
          Resume the simulation
 void start()
          Start the simulation
 void step()
          Execute one step of the simulation
 void stop()
          Stop the simulation
 

Method Detail

start

void start()
Start the simulation

Precondition:
GUI is connected to a Simulator and Simulator is ready
Postcondition
Simulation is running

stop

void stop()
Stop the simulation

Precondition:
Simulation is running
Postcondition
Simulation is stopped

pause

void pause()
Interrupt the simulation

Precondition:
Simulation is running
Postcondition
Simulation is interrupted

resume

void resume()
Resume the simulation

Precondition:
Simulation is interrupted
Postcondition
Simulation is running

step

void step()
Execute one step of the simulation

Precondition:
Simulation is interrupted
Postcondition
Simulation is interrupted

inspect

void inspect(SimObject object)
Show a graphical representation of the internal state of the objects and the events it has received so far

Precondition:
object is a valid object
Postcondition
A window with the representation of the object is shown to the user
